          <title>
            <string language="en">Cutting a DNA strand using restriction enzyme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schnitt einer DNA Faser mit Beschränkung Enzym</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Coupure d'un brin d'ADN en utilisant l'enzyme de 
restriction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cortando uma costa do DNA usando o enzyme da 
limitação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Taglio del filo del DNA usando l'enzima di 
limitazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοπή ενός σκέλους DNA που χρησιμοποιεί το ένζυμο 
περιορισμού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cortar un hilo de la DNA usando la enzima de la 
restricción</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows how the restriction enzyme BamHI cuts a DNA strand at the target sites.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dna strand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">genetic engineering</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">genome</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">restriction enzyme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">target site</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, wie das Beschränkung 
Enzym BamHI eine DNA Faser an den Zielsites schneidet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre comment l'enzyme BamHI de 
restriction coupe un brin d'ADN aux sites de cible.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra como o enzyme BamHI da 
limitação corta uma costa do DNA nos locais do alvo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra come l'enzima BamHI di 
limitazione taglia un filo del DNA ai luoghi dell'obiettivo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επιδεικνύει πώς το ένζυμο BamHI 
περιορισμού κόβει ένα σκέλος DNA επί των τόπων στόχων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra cómo la enzima BamHI de la
restricción corta un hilo de la DNA en los sitios de la blanco.</string>
          </description>
